transcript:
Customer: Sukh tera ditta lahi.

Hello?

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Ji good morning sir ji, Amrit baat kar raha hu.

Customer: Hello?

Executive: India Mart se sir aapka account manager Amrit.

Customer: Achcha ye number to alag hai yaar. Achcha thik hai.

Executive: Are nahi nahi nahi ye India Mart ka number hai. Actually kya hua tha aapne India Mart ke side customer service par call kar diya hoga.

Customer: Jiske vajah se ticket hai wo open ho gayi hai. Kal ya parso aapne shayad kal hi parso aapne call kiya tha mujhe.

Customer: Haan haan haan haan haan.

Executive: Haan to uske vajah se ticket open ho gayi.

Customer: Achcha achcha.

Executive: To aapko wo solution mil gaya tenders jo aapne purchase kara tha wo mil gaya aapko?

Customer: Haan. Haan haan haan haan haan.

Executive: Chalo thik hai. To wo ticket jo hai main close kar raha hu. Thik hai isliye is vajah se is number se call kiya otherwise mere personal number se call jati. Jab ticket open hota hai to India Mart ke number se call jati hai. Ye recorded line par call hoti hai. Thik hai.

Executive: To main ye tha to main ye ticket close kar de raha hu. Aapke pass ek ek mail aayega abhi India Mart ke side se ki aapko aapka jo problem tha uska solution mila nahi hai aur aap usse satisfied ho ya not satisfied. To us par aap apne according satisfied jo hai wo mark kar dena. Thik hai.

Customer: Thik hai. Abhi mil jayega aapko hamari taraf se. Okay sir.

Customer: Okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had raised a ticket earlier.

- Enquired if the customer received the tenders.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the customer received the tenders.

- Executive is closing the ticket.

- Executive informed about satisfaction feedback mail.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- ticket, tenders, satisfaction, closure
